news.title: President Higgins praises UN High Commissioner for Refugees for his “exceptional commitment” to refugees worldwide
news.summary: The two last met in 2019, and yesterday's meeting marks the continuation of their discussions throughout the UN High Commissioner's term.

news.title: King Princess announces new album Girl Violence and Dublin date
news.summary: She will play in Dublin’s Vicar Street on December 3.

news.title: Kean Kavanagh announces tour dates and shares new music video
news.summary: Watch his new music video for 'Time Goes By' below.

news.title: Watch: Bricknasty share video for new single 'Go Get That Blade'
news.summary: The group have just announced multiple Irish shows for November, including dates in Dublin's 3Olympia Theatre, Galway, Cork, and more

news.title: Date change and venue upgrade announced for Turnstile in Dublin due to demand
news.summary: It will take place on November 1 in Dublin’s 3Arena.

news.title: Jeff Tweedy announces triple album Twilight Override
news.summary: “The three chapters of Twilight Override stand alone, but together, they tell a story of the past, present and future.”

news.title: Hardwicke Circus's Ukraine Tour Diary - Part 6: The Circle Remains Unbroken
news.summary: In the final instalment of Tom Foster’s diary, he reflects on the conclusion to the band’s remarkable odyssey.
